mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COURSE_EXAM_TYPE ( COURSE_CODE, TYPE_NAME, QUESTION_CNT, USE_YN, TOTAL_RATIO, WEEK_RATIO, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER ) VALUES ( #{COURSE_CODE}, #{TYPE_NAME}, #{QUESTION_CNT}, #{USE_YN}, #{TOTAL_RATIO}, #{WEEK_RATIO}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{SESSION_USER_ID} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.SEQ, A.EXAM_TYPE_SEQ, A.EXAM_KIND, A.WEEK_FROM, A.WEEK_TO, A.TYPE, A.LEVEL, A.QUESTION_CNT, A.USE_YN, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(A.UPDATE_DATE, A.CREATE_DATE), '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') LAST_UPDATE_DATE, IFNULL(U2.USER_NAME, U1.USER_NAME) LAST_UPDATE_USER, 'N' NEW_FLAG FROM COURSE_EXAM_TYPE_STANDARD A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER U1 ON A.CREATE_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER U2 ON A.UPDATE_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE A.EXAM_TYPE_SEQ = #{EXAM_TYPE_SEQ} ORDER BY A.EXAM_KIND, A.WEEK_FROM
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COURSE_EXAM_TYPE_STANDARD ( EXAM_TYPE_SEQ, EXAM_KIND, WEEK_FROM, WEEK_TO, TYPE, LEVEL, QUESTION_CNT, USE_YN, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER ) VALUES ( #{EXAM_TYPE_SEQ}, #{EXAM_KIND}, #{WEEK_FROM}, #{WEEK_TO}, #{TYPE}, #{LEVEL}, #{QUESTION_CNT}, #{USE_YN}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{SESSION_USER_ID} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USER_EXAM WHERE COURSE_ID = 0 AND USER_ID = '-' AND EXAM_KIND = #{EXAM_KIND}
mapper.select: SELECT WEEK_FROM ,WEEK_TO ,TYPE ,LEVEL ,QUESTION_CNT ,EXAM_KIND ,#{COURSE_ID} COURSE_ID ,#{USER_ID} USER_ID FROM COURSE_EXAM_TYPE_STANDARD WHERE EXAM_TYPE_SEQ = #{SEQ} AND EXAM_KIND = #{EXAM_KIND} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT A.SEQ ,C.TYPE ,C.QUESTION ,C.QA1 ,C.QA2 ,C.QA3 ,C.QA4 FROM USER_EXAM A JOIN COURSE_EXAM C ON C.COURSE_CODE = #{COURSE_CODE} AND C.SEQ = A.SEQ WHERE A.COURSE_ID = 0 AND A.USER_ID = '-' AND A.EXAM_KIND = #{EXAM_KIND} ORDER BY RAND()
